1.0.name: wordpress/roses-like-this
1.0.description:
A simple 'I like this' plugin inspired by the facebook 'like' functionality. For visitors who don't want to bother with commenting. http://lifeasrose.ca/2011/03/wordpress-plugin-i-like-this has a blog entry all about it :)

A big thanks to Dong (ddliuhb@gmail.com) for finding a syntactical error that was causing problems for some people. And thanks to Raphael (ressoosnowdon@googlemail.com) for noticing this error and working hard to figure out what it was.
